title: Mayday.Air.Crash.Investigations.S02.E05.Lost.DVD.720p.x264.AAC.m
description:
Lost

Aired on 02/20/2005, Narrated by Jonathan Aris

On 20 December 1995, American Airlines Flight 965, a Boeing 757-200, is en route to Cali, Colombia. The crew are asked if they would like to perform a straight-in approach to Cali. The pilots accept the offer, but as they are making the necessary changes, they become unsure of their exact position. Only four passengers and a dog survive.
